page.title: 14CHURCH
page.content: {CHURCH} Church of England services are held every Sunday at 08.00 and 10.45. Our church is called St. Peter's, in the Parish of Rowley, and the Rector is the Reverend P.Thomas.{ {BIBLE GROUP} The Rector holds a Bible study group once a month. A character or a Gospel from the Bible will be discussed at the Rectory by about 20 members. {PRAYER GROUP} The Prayer Group is also held in the Rectory. A discussion is held first, leading to prayer. {WEDNESDAY CLUB} This club is held weekly in the Methodist Chapel. 6-11 yr.olds can play games, sing, perform plays and say prayers.
